properties.comment: Model parameter definition ========================== Model : Pump Type : Spandau Vogel PV 80/180 Parameters ---------- PressureSamples [Pa] Array of operation points for the pump MassFlowSamples [kg/s] Array of corresponding mass floes to the given pressure samples DensityFluid [kg/m3] desity of the pumped fluid ElectricalPower [W] Electrical power of the pump if running
